lyrics:
24 contributorstonight i’m getting over you lyricsverse 1
i wanna smash your fears

i wanna touch your heart

make you plead and cry as you give up all the lies

refrain

no more crying
to get me through
ill keep dancing til the morning with somebody new
tonight im getting over you
